remarks: The predicate "is an associative operation".  (Contributed by FL, 1-Nov-2009.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
isass.1 $e |- X = dom dom G $.
isass $p |- ( G e. A -> ( G e. Ass <-> A. x e. X A. y e. X A. z e. X ( ( x G y ) G z ) = ( x G ( y G z ) ) ) ) $.
$d G x y z $.
$d X x y z $.
